July 2, 1932 D Burley Contest
Burley Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
burley-contest
None
The Magic Flute [unknown arranger]
Recreation Ground, Burley-in-Wharfedale, Yorkshire Prizes - 1st £12.12s., 2nd £7.7s., 3rd £3.3s., 4th £1.10s. March contest(own choice) - 1st Ruston's Engineers(B.B.and C.F.), 2nd Bradford City(President). Promoted by Arthur Newsome Works band. 11 bands competed.
Sept. 1, 2013, 6:47 a.m. Dec. 19, 2018, 2:35 p.m.
